name: cdkdemo
description: Sample proof of concept project to experiment AWS CDK features in a serverless project.

scripts.copyLayer: npm run buildDeps && cp -r infra/layers bin/infra/
scripts.build: rm -rf bin && npm install && tsc && npm run copyLayer
scripts.synth: npm run build && cdk synth DemoAppMicroServiceStack --profile dtldev
scripts.diff: npm run build && cdk diff DemoAppMicroServiceStack --profile dtldev
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cdk deploy DemoAppMicroServiceStack --profile dtldev
scripts.destroy: npm run build && cdk destroy DemoAppMicroServiceStack --profile dtldev
